description: ISRIC World Soil Texture Classification at the surface level. Broken into 12 classes of 1:Cl, 2:SiCl, 3:SaCl, 4:ClLo, 5:SiClLo, 6:SaClLo, 7:Lo, 8:SiLo, 9:SaLo, 10:Si, 11:LoSa, 12:Sa.
